comment_text:
I admit I was attracted by the exquisite CG scene though I don’t know what happened to them.
因為司空震大人拿了很重要的方塊核心,然後一個叫曉天組織的秘密組織一直被,狄仁傑認為他想偷方塊核心,but經過一場激烈打鬥後,狄仁傑捉住了對方,最後發現原來是是自己的上司,也就是武則天,但是我懷疑武則天是假的

title: Game CG | The Gift Of Time - Honor of Kings (8th anniversary) 2023 王者荣耀CG时光的礼物 8周年庆 King of Glory
comment_text:
Is it a game?
yes, but It will had a donghua series release on spring 2024
Yes, this game is called 王者荣耀 in the Chinese version and Honor of Kings in the international version.
This CG was released on the 8th anniversary of Honor of Kings. The female character in the CG is called "Aguduo". At the same time, her character skin was released on the 8th anniversary. It was designed with the theme of "Yangtze River Ecological Protection". In this skin, Aguduo Duo transformed into a cute little painter, playing in the water with Baiji dolphins and finless porpoises. The one with a long mouth is the Baiji porpoise, and the one with a short mouth is the finless porpoise. Both species are present on the skin. Thanks to the protection of the Yangtze River, the number of finless porpoises has slowly increased. You can see videos of finless porpoises posted in many places. The Baiji dolphin has become functionally extinct, so some water drop elements can be seen in the design of the skin, which can be understood as tears of regret.

title: Game CG | The Gift Of Time - Honor of Kings (8th anniversary) 2023 王者荣耀CG时光的礼物 8周年庆 King of Glory
comment_text: This CG was released on the 8th anniversary of Honor of Kings. The female character in the CG is called "Aguduo". At the same time, her character skin was released on the 8th anniversary. It was designed with the theme of "Yangtze River Ecological Protection". In this skin, Aguduo Duo transformed into a cute little painter, playing in the water with Baiji dolphins and finless porpoises. The one with a long mouth is the Baiji porpoise, and the one with a short mouth is the finless porpoise. Both species are present on the skin. Thanks to the protection of the Yangtze River, the number of finless porpoises has slowly increased. You can see videos of finless porpoises posted in many places. The Baiji dolphin has become functionally extinct, so some water drop elements can be seen in the design of the skin, which can be understood as tears of regret.

comment_text: 其实吧，是因为王者以后要做很多东西，拍电影，搞电视剧。。。很多，许多不了解王者的人看到李白成吉思汗刘邦这些不同朝代的人同时出场对王者会有很大的舆论影响，所以才要改名，改了名字就不会有舆论压力了。我认为以后肯定还会出历史角色，他现在历史角色只是填补背景故事的空缺而不会再创新，像是鲁班大师，蒙恬都是因为有了儿子自己才上的。以后我认为还是会出历史角色的，不过只是填坑，我觉得吴国的孙权就是一个要填补的空缺。个人见解，不喜勿喷～

title: Game CG | King of Glory: Hai Yue - The Luna Sea of Cloudland 2022 王者荣耀CG 海月 幻海映月 Honor of Kings
comment_text:
小传：
在海月来到这个世上，所有人都把他视为无用之物应为海月出身的时候没有父母而且他的体制很差，所以村里的人使他为无用之物，在某一天，村民们应为一些原因，将海月赶出了村子，海月在逃到一处森林的时候，突然出现一大批野兽将他包围，就在海月陷入绝望的时候，一个叫帝俊的神解救了他，然后海月发誓要将自己的一切奉献给帝俊，但是在某一天，帝俊被杨典娜的军队给包围了，就在帝俊要死的时候，海月将杨典娜的军队给拉进了他的幻境里，正是这一瞬间，才让帝俊给跑了，但是海月也昏了过去，但是在某一天，海月突然被一场爆炸给炸醒了，然后海月收了这个叫卫野的小弟，1000年后，海月想要利用月神台来复活帝俊，但是在仪式开始的时候，沙之盟小队的五个人阴差阳错的来到了仪式，然后海月正要利用他们的力量来复活帝俊的时候，卫野反水，帮助沙之盟小队结束了仪式，但是卫野也死了，就在海月想要胖揍沙之盟一顿突然外界有人激活了五雷镇鼓，所以海月暂时先去司空震那里处理他了（我这边为了省事，直接跳过了一部分，想要看完整版的，去王者荣耀里看海月的故事）

comment_text:
Isn't Chang'e the chinees godess of the moon?
嫦娥 Chang'e is the later goddess of the moon, and the moon existed before she flew to the moon.
The earliest Chinese goddess of moon is 常羲(Chang Xi), she is directly equal to the moon itself. the wife of God 帝俊(Di Jun). She gave birth to 12 princesses (the 12 months) for Di Jun. 
And Di Jun has two wives, another one is the sun 羲和(Xi He), Xi He is the mother of the 10 suns princes, those 10 suns, 9 of them were shot down by 后羿(Houyi) ,  only 1 sun in the sky. 后羿(HouYi) is the husband of Chang'e.
In short, 常羲 (Chang Xi) = moon, 
Chang'e flew to the moon later and became the goddess of the moon. and lives in the moon with the rabbits. 
海月Haiyue (Luna Sea) in this video, is the incarnation of 常羲Chang Xi. 帝俊Di Jun is her husband. Because of the ancient war between gods, she died once, and Di Jun turned her body to  crystal and let her into a deep sleep. Now she is awake and obsessed with resurrecting Di Jun.
